name: Fires of Fatigue
description:
Doesn't a little bit of heat turn anyone mighty peckish? Push the containers into the flames that shoot out from between the fireballs and collect their drops for points and bonuses! But make sure you don't end up combusting yourself!

Features:

- A game made entirely from scratch; from the soundtrack and fx all the way to the font, every single asset in this game I created myself!
- A tepid test of endurance where your quick decision-making abilities hold the reins! Will you stay out of harm's way, or try to rack up more points by playing more aggressively?
- Play as an adorable, friend-shaped dragon going on a sugary stride for pastries and candies!
- Too hot under your feet? Employ the bizarre effects of 6 unique powerups to get you out of a nasty heat wave!
- 32 different snack foods to collect, each with different score values! Try not to gorge yourself!
- A simulated 3-dimensional playing field!
- Fluid animation and lighting effects!
- Energetic psytrance music during gameplay!
- Game gets progressively harder the longer the player survives.
- Ten languages supported (English, Dutch, German, Polish, French, Italian, Russian, Danish, Spanish, Hebrew).

For a more stable experience (no lag, plus some visual updates) download the desktop version here:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/p4e6n9yzjiw712n/Fires%20of%20Fatigue%20Desktop2.zip?dl=0
